oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Month promos - 1972-08-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of various country music month promos featuring Tompall Glaser (performer), Charley Pride (performer), Mayf Mutter (performer), Susan Raye (performer), Ray Price (performer), Jody Miller (performer), and Hank Williams Jr. (performer), recorded on August 10, 1972.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00 )Test tone --(00:20) Country Music Month radio spot (Tompall Glaser) -- (00:50) Country Music Month radio spot (Charley Pride) -- (01:16) Country Music Month radio spot (Mayf Nutter) -- (01:35) Country Music Month radio spot (Susan Raye) -- (01:54) Country Music Month radio spot (Ray Price) -- (02:17) Country Music Month radio spot (Jody Miller) -- (02:38) Country Music Month radio spot (Hank Williams Jr.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Association (U.S.); Glaser, Tompall; Pride, Charley, 1938-; Nutter, Mayf; Raye, Susan; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Miller, Jody; Williams, Hank, Jr., 1949-;
